bio_tip: Tell us about yourself and leave your social media links
about_1: BHO was founded in 2019 by a group of young Sudanese women and men in the early stages of their professional careers. This organization was merely an idea that sparked in the midst of the Sudanese revolution.
about_2: In June of 2019 during the country’s state of emergency, a time when internet access was blocked and means of communication became scarce. This small group decided to help and started the “Mobadarat Kahrabtak wa raseedak 3laina” initiative supplying the community with free electricity and calling credit.
about_3: Shortly after, they began their winter clothing campaign providing winter clothes to the homeless.
about_4: Moved by the revolutions slogan to rebuild, they decided to redirect their efforts to the most vulnerable sector of the community, children.
about_5: By rehabilitating and rebuilding schools in the outskirts of Sudan BHO aims to make a difference by insuring access to education for all.
about_6: We strive to be catalysts for change to improve access to education for all children.
